General.Name: QC Solar (Suzhou) Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: QC Solar Corporation engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of photovoltaic systems and power storage connecting products in China. It offers solar junction boxes, such as PV smarttrack and PV junction box, PV connectors, and PV cables; solar bos kits, including PV combiner box, connector, cable, and supermarket kits; energy storage/EV charging systems; automation and control systems, such as split junction box, on site connectors, and pre-link connector and harness; and outdoor connectors. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Suzhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Xinlin  Wang
1.Title: Director, Deputy Gen. Mang. and Sec. of the Board
